sentences.sContent: In going 20 years, petrifaction industry also obtained swift and violent development in thalassic area, already became one of main force of international petrifaction course of study.
sentences.sContent_eng: In going 20 years, petrifaction industry also obtained swift and violent development in thalassic area, already became one of main force of international petrifaction course of study.
sentences.sCn: 在过去20年中，石化工业在海湾地区也取得了迅猛的发展，已成为国际石化业的主力军之一。

trans.tranCn: 海的, 内海的, 海湾的
trans.tranOther: of or relating to the sea
